resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106460</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106460</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207088</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">High School Environmental Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">High School Klimamitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre Environnemental de Lycée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro Ambiental Da High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro Ambientale Della High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβαλλοντικό κέντρο γυμνασίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro Ambiental De la High School Secundaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a portal to environmental resources. It organizes sites by topics: air pollution, climate change, global warming; conservation of energy, soil, and water; coral reefs, forests, watersheds, and other ecosystems; drinking water, waste water, ground water; asthma, lead, pesticides, sun protection, and other health issues; waste and recycling; and local data and maps.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Portal zu den Klimabetriebsmitteln. 
Es organisiert Sites durch Themen: Luftverschmutzung, 
Klimaänderung, globales Wärmen; Energieeinsparung, Boden und 
Wasser; Korallenriffe, Wälder, Wasserscheiden und andere 
Oekosysteme; Trinkwasser, Abwasser, Grundwasser; Asthma, 
Leitung, Schädlingsbekämpfungsmittel, Sonneschutz und andere 
Gesundheit Ausgaben; Vergeudung und Wiederverwertung; und 
lokale Daten und Karten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un portail aux ressources environnementales. 
Il organise des sites par des sujets : pollution 
atmosphérique, changement de climat, chauffage global ; 
économie d'énergie, de sol, et d'eau ; récifs de 
corail, forêts, lignes de partage, et d'autres écosystèmes ; 
eau potable, eaux résiduaires, eaux souterraines ; 
asthme, fil de sortie, pesticides, protection du soleil, et 
d'autres issues de santé ; perte et réutilisation ; et 
données locales et cartes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um portal aos recursos ambientais. 
Organiza locais por tópicos: poluição de ar, mudança 
do clima, aquecer-se global; conservation de energia, de solo, e
de água; recifes corais, florestas, watersheds, e outros 
ecosystems; água bebendo, água waste, água à terra; 
asthma, ligação, pesticides, proteção do sol, e outras 
edições da saúde; desperdício e recycling; e dados 
locais e mapas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un portal alle risorse ambientali. 
Organizza i luoghi dai soggetti: inquinamento atmosferico,
cambiamento di clima, riscaldamento globale; conservazione di 
energia, di terreno e di acqua; reefs di corallo, foreste, 
spartiacque ed altri ecosistemi; acqua potabile, acque di 
rifiuto, acqua sotterranea; asma, cavo, antiparassitari, 
protezione del sole ed altre edizioni di salute; spreco e 
riciclare; e dati locali e programmi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια πύλη στα περιβαλλοντικά στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς. Οργανώνει τις περιοχές από τα θέματα: 
ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση, αλλαγή κλίματος, παγκόσμια αύξηση 
της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου  
συντήρηση της ενέργειας, του χώματος, και της ύδρευσης  
κοραλλιογενείς ύφαλοι, δάση, υδροκρίτες, και άλλα 
οικοσυστήματα  πόσιμο νερό, υγρά απόβλητα, υπόγειο νερό  
άσθμα, μόλυβδος, φυτοφάρμακα, προστασία ήλιων, και άλλα 
ζητήματα υγείας  απόβλητα και ανακύκλωση  και τοπικοί
στοιχεία και χάρτες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">está un portal a los recursos ambientales. 
Ordena sitios por asuntos: contaminación atmosférica, 
cambio del clima, el calentarse global; conservación de la 
energía, del suelo, y del agua; filones coralinos, bosques, 
líneas divisoria de las aguas, y otros ecosistemas; agua 
potable, agua inútil, agua subterránea; asma, terminal de 
componente, pesticidas, protección del sol, y otras ediciones de la 
salud; basura y reciclaje; y datos locales y 
correspondencias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207088</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106460</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/high-school-environmental-center</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
